test_report.title: Infinitus Trading Bot - Final Verification Test (Iteration 2)

hero_section_24_7_selector.description: Hero Section 24/7 Auto Trading card selector test

details.test_performed: Verified unique data-testid selector and clickability
details.expected: Card should be selectable with unique data-testid='hero-24-7-card'
details.actual: Card found with data-testid and is clickable
details.issue_resolved: Previously had selector conflict with multiple elements having same text. Now has unique data-testid.

details.test_performed: Tested left arrow, right arrow, and dot indicator navigation
details.expected: All navigation elements should be clickable and functional
details.actual: Left arrow clickable, right arrow clickable, dot indicators (3) found and clickable
details.issue_resolved: Previously had element visibility issues preventing clicks. Navigation buttons now working properly.

sticky_footer_cta.description: Sticky footer CTA visibility and interaction test

details.test_performed: Tested scroll trigger (500px), visibility, button clicks, and dismiss functionality
details.expected: Footer should appear after 500px scroll, buttons should work, dismiss should hide footer
details.actual: Footer appears correctly with 'Ready to start trading smarter?' text, Launch Bot Now button clickable, X dismiss button working
details.issue_resolved: Previously sticky footer was not appearing when scrolling down 500px. Visibility trigger now working properly.

issues_fixed: Testimonial carousel navigation buttons now working
Sticky footer CTA visibility trigger fixed
Hero section 24/7 card selector conflict resolved

summary.message: Final verification successful. All 3 previously failing issues have been resolved.
summary.recommendation: Landing page is now fully functional and ready for production use.
